JobFullDesc: About the TeamOur drivers go the extra mile for Riders, offering a high quality of service and taking pride in the experience they offer. On the Driver Progression Team, our mission is to provide drivers Recognition, Rewards and Feedback for their service, helping create a long term relationship with Uber.We do this in the form of four distinct areas of investments -Tipping, Rating and FeedbackUber Pro Loyalty Program and RewardsDriver Surveys and SentimentRegulatory Benefits Support (i.e. Prop 22)If we are successful, we will be able to increase driver’s satisfaction with Uber’s platform and improve Quality of service provided to RidersAbout the RoleAs the Product Manager for Driver Benefits at Uber, you will own the end-to-end execution of Regulatory and COVID-related Benefits for drivers. Examples of the kinds of Driver Benefits that this person would be responsible for include -California Prop 22 Earnings Guarantee and Healthcare StipendPPE, Vaccine and COVID Financial Stipend Distribution for DriversCompliance with Sick Pay, Time Off regulations in specific US and UK marketsTo do this role well, this candidate needs to demonstrate UX chops, deep understanding of our backend systems, ability to manage edge cases and deliver speedy features to comply with regulatory deadlines.The scope of this team will grow over time as more Regulatory and COVID-related Driver Benefits emerge -- the candidate who takes this role will have the opportunity to build the strategy for this area from the ground up, eventually creating an extensible Benefits platform that meets a multitude of use cases.What the Candidate Will Do:Take broad, conceptual requirements & work closely with engineering to make them a reality.Work across multiple engineering teams, and do a massive amount of sheep herding to deliver E2E Benefits that have components in multiple tech stacks.Own a product roadmap and lead vision, definition, and execution for building Uber's Benefits PlatformThrive in an environment of fast feedback loops and an attitude of rapid iterations.Basic QualificationsMinimum of 3 years of Product management experience.Experience working across multiple teams and managing complex network of stakeholdersStrong product sense and ability to craft a long term visionObsession with details and data-driven decision makingPreferred Qualifications:Some past experience working closely with Legal and Policy on Regulatory productsFull stack product delivery that includes UX and backend systemsAny experience working with gig economy earnersAt Uber, we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion. We take on big problems to help drivers, riders, delivery partners, and eaters get moving in more than 600 cities around the world.We welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently.
